items.title: At least 170 US hospitals face major flood risk: Experts say Trump is making it worse
items.description: When a big storm hits, Peninsula Hospital could be underwater.

items.title: Concussions might be early warning sign for ALS, study argues
items.description: Concussions and traumatic brain injuries (TBI) have been considered a potential cause of ALS, also known as Lou Gehrig's disease.

items.title: Tailoring and teamwork help hospitals reduce wasteful pre-surgery testing
items.description: Every day, patients with an upcoming operation roll up their sleeves for blood tests or get heart and lung tests and scans.
